cause.description:
TO ALL SECULARIST TO ALL LEFTIST AROUND THE WORLD TO ALL WHO WANTED AND STILL WANTS TO FIGHT THE EXTREMISM TO THE PERSONS WHO WNT CIVIL MARRRIAGE TO ALL THE ATHEIST AND AGNOSTICS

2. ESTABLISH N EQUL AND SOCIAL ECONOMY
3. ESTABLISH HUAN RIGHTS AND STOP THE CHURCHS AND MOSQUEE(AND ALL OTHER REIGIOUS ORGNZ) INTERVENTION
cause.mission: TO ESTABLISH SECULARISM AROUND THE WORLD
cause.name: THE SECUARISTS
